com.intechcore.scomponents.scell.api.fx.control

Interface IUiGridMetrics


  • public interface IUiGridMetrics
    Represents UI service interface to convert grid canvas coordinates to cells addresses

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

    • Method Detail

      • getVisibleCellAddress

        IRangeAddress getVisibleCellAddress(double x,
                                    double y)
        Converts grid canvas pixels to IRangeAddress
        Parameters:
        x - horizontal coordinate (from left to right, in pixels)
        y - vertical coordinate (from top to bottom, in pixels)
        Returns:
        a IRangeAddress of cell owns given point

      • getVisibleRowIndex

        int getVisibleRowIndex(double y)
        Converts grid canvas vertical coordinate to number of the IRow
        Parameters:
        y - the vertical coordinate (from top to bottom, in pixels)
        Returns:
        the CompletableFuture of a IRow number (starts from 1)

      • getVisibleColumnIndex

        int getVisibleColumnIndex(double x)
        Converts grid canvas horizontal coordinate to number of the IColumn
        Parameters:
        x - the horizontal coordinate (from left to right, in pixels)
        Returns:
        a IColumn number (starts from 1) own given x-coordinate
